lesson.subtitle: Word Formation: Place and Object Names
lesson.description: Learner can identify suffixes that form place and object names in Ukrainian
objectives: Learner can identify suffixes that form place and object names in Ukrainian
Learner can derive place names from verbs and nouns using appropriate suffixes
Learner can distinguish between -–Ω—è, -–∏—â–µ, and -–∞—Ä–Ω—è formations
Learner can use place vocabulary appropriately in context
